actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to establish a program of Federal grants to encourage the employment and training of unemployed individuals.

summary.text: Training and Employment Act - Requires the Secretary of Labor to establish and administer an employment and training program which makes grants to State agencies for distribution to qualifying employers who employ previously unemployed individuals. Specifies priorities for distribution of such grants and formulas for the amounts of the subsidies. Authorizes appropriations of $2,000,000,000 for fiscal year 1980 and $2,100,000,000 for fiscal year 1981.

titles.title: A bill to establish a program of Federal grants to encourage the employment and training of unemployed individuals.
